analysis.description:
Reentrancy in RewardsMinter.mintIfWeightEnough (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol#816-828):
	External calls:
	- mint(mintProposals[idx].beneficiary,mintProposals[idx].amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol#822-823)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- mintProposals (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol#823-825)

RewardsMinter.tokenRevoke (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol#849-853) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.revoke(_from,_value) (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol)

RewardsMinter.tokenFinishMinting (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol)

RevokeHandler.revokeTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.revoke(_holders[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol)

RevokeHandler.revokeTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.revoke(_holders[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol)

Reentrancy in RewardsMinter.constructor (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol#755-770):
	External calls:
	- token.setWhitelisted(address(this),true) (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol#758-760)
	- token.setWhitelisted(msg.sender,true) (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol#760)
	- token.pause() (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol#761)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- requiredWeight (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol#767)
	- signers (/unique_chucks/17/0xa5ef3d7eb2e933d4d796113ea52a677e7cd8e05d.sol#767-768)
